characters.story: "TSOO!" the rice sings cheerfully - coarse, rough and crude!
The pinnacle bends down drooping - to block, stop and prevent killing!
"DYEH?" the think tank, crown and shelves question curiously - to heap, stack and fold clothes?
The think tank and soil bend down drooping - a baseball base, fortress and mound!
"CHOO?" the metal questions curiously to assist - a hoe, to weed and root out evil?
"TSUNG?" the side by side and soil question curiously - a thicket, jungle cluster?
"POO?" the tree and yoga question curiously - plain, simple and unadorned?
"POO!" the fingers and yoga sing cheerfully - to pounce on, attack and extinguish fire!
"POO?" the person questions curiously - a servant, attendant and butler?
The words bend down drooping - a musical score, notation and spectrum!
"HUNG!" the mouth and together sing cheerfully - to fool, coax and deceive!
"HUNG?" the water and together question curiously - a deluge, flood to inundate?
"HUNG!" the fire and together sing cheerfully - to warm by a fire, bake and toast!
"GUNG!" the heart sings cheerfully - respectful, courteous and polite!
The fingers and together bend down drooping - to arch, bow like a bridge!
"BAO!" the sun commands sharply - violent, brutal and fierce!
"POO!" the water and violent command sharply - a waterfall, a cascade separating Canada and America!
"BAO!" the fire and violent command sharply - to explode, blast and detonate!
